TopicTitle: My bizarre hypos about the Kerbal's future history

Articles.Content:
According to my researches about the ksp ancient version, I found a terrible theory:

The kerbal's future can be seen from the older versions.

First the kerbals started their program. (1.12)

The space program really helped their technology develop, but it also brings kerbin terrible pollutions. Kerbals soon stopped taking their helmets off, banned fireworks.(1.11, 1.8)

Kerbals in space became weaker and weaker, so they can no longer do constructions.(1.10)

The space program might damaged their economy, so parts manufactory reduced their parts types. Fancy colors turn into dirty dull color. (1.4)

Suddenly one day the KSC was destroyed for an unknown reason, the kerbals can no longer design new Ksc so they just simply copied the inland KSC. A cult formed between the Kerbals, their name started to repeat after the died ones.(0.2x)

War or disasters spread across Kerbin due to climate change and the KSC was deserted for a long time. Kerbin turned yellower due to the death of plants.

After an even longer time, the Kerbals finally restated their project. They no longer produce the older types of parts, use unpainted parts instead.

Sun started to aging, heating Moho up and then asteroids hit Moho, totally changed its appearance, Volcanic activities restarted.

The Kerbals lost the tracking of Dres, Eeloo and Pol.(0.17)

However the new space program didn't last long. Something more terrible ruined it again, with the kerbal's civilization.

Kerbals immediately lose their tracking of everything outside kerbin's soi. The Kerbals stopped doing EVA due to the terrible space environment caused by the aging sun.(0.16, 0.15)

Minmus vaporized , turned into a comet and soon destroyed.(0.14)

Kerbin's terrain decayed, ice caps melted, Kerbals hide into the VAB due to growing radiation. The population of kerbal decreased rapidly(0.13.3)

Parts are no longer produced, but found lying by the side of the road. All kerbals now hiding inside ksc, Formed a small society. They are doomed. All of them started to believe that the space is the Heaven, starting to launching themselves into the space with their fragile junk crafts, naming themselves Jeb, Bill and Bob, locking themselves into a small capsule with no return: They can't even tracking the launched crafts anymore! (0.12)

The number of kerbals is still decreasing due to their suicidal launch.

The battery and computers inside the command pods malfunctioned due to solar storm, the launched crafts can no longer view its orbit(0.11)

At the final age, 0.7.3, only a few Kerbals left, Kerbin lose its most atmosphere. The last kerbals have only one thought in their mind: Launching spacecrafts, with their lacking parts. They lose the fuel flowing technology so stacking fuel tanks no longer give engine more fuel. 

With the last kerbals rose into the space with no return, Kerbals extincted, kerbal's space program reached an ending.

 

Edited January 3, 2023 by Kerbal123_Furry

The updates were simply going back in time. 

How could we not have noticed all along?

On 1/3/2023 at 1:46 AM, Kerbal123_Furry said:

Parts are no longer produced, but found lying by the side of the road

SLS can attest
